Literature.Title: The host defense peptide β-defensin confers protection against Vibrio anguillarum in ayu, Plecoglossus altivelis
Literature.Author: Zhou Y, Zhou QJ, Qiao Y, Chen J, Li MY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 7966(MIC=16µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=32µg/ml),Edwardsiella tarda MCCC 235(MIC=64µg/ml),Vibrio vulnificus ATCC 279562(MIC=64µg/ml),Vibrio anguillarum ATCC 19264(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=64µg/ml),Streptococcus iniae ATCC 29178(no activity data),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ATCC 33847(no activity data),Vibrio alginolyticus ATCC 17749(no activity data),Vibrio harveyi ATCC 33866(no activity data)
